channel.title: [NEW] PK-Flash 317 [317 deob]
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]PK-Flash 317 project[/size][/center] [center]A true pking server[/center]
[center][b][u]what is it?[/u][/b] pk-flash is going to be a true pking server with no overpowered items, med xp, no customs, and skilling for a stable economy items shouldnt be too hard to get but they shouldnt be right there for the taking, so fast skilling should make this possible.[/center]
[b][u]Progress[/u][/b] [u]10/20/09[/u] Project begins
[b][u]Goals[/u][/b] -stablize skilling and combat xp rates, not too low, but not 99 in 10 mins -launch a website w/ forums + highscores (if possible) -organize home at the prayer guild or possibly a new unique area -edit shops -create training and monster hunting areas
[u][b]app[/b][/u]
Age- Experience-
chose any of the following
-client coder -server coder -gfx designer -web designer -other (explain)

item.title: [NEW] PK-Flash 317 [317 deob]

item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

[center][size=20pt]PK-Flash 317 project[/size][/center]
[center]A true pking server[/center]

[center]what is it?
pk-flash is going to be a true pking server with no overpowered items, med xp, no customs, and skilling for a stable economy
items shouldnt be too hard to get but they shouldnt be right there for the taking, so fast skilling should make this possible.[/center]

Progress
10/20/09 Project begins

Goals
-stablize skilling and combat xp rates, not too low, but not 99 in 10 mins
-launch a website w/ forums + highscores (if possible)
-organize home at the prayer guild or possibly a new unique area
-edit shops
-create training and monster hunting areas
